translation.title: Incredible Things About the Realized One (2nd)

previous.name: Incredible Things About the Realized One (1st)

segments.en: 128. Incredible Things About the Realized One (2nd)

segments.pli: “Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā pātubhavanti.
segments.en: “Mendicants, with the appearance of a Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha, four incredible and amazing things appear.
People like attachment, they love it and enjoy it.

segments.pli: sā tathāgatena anālaye dhamme desiyamāne sussūsati sotaṃ odahati aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapeti.
segments.en: Yet when a Realized One is teaching the Dhamma of non-adherence, they want to listen, they lend an ear, and they apply their minds to understand it.

segments.pli: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā ayaṃ paṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo pātubhavati.
segments.en: This is the first incredible and amazing thing that appears with the appearance of a Realized One.
People like conceit, they love it and enjoy it.

segments.pli: Sā tathāgatena mānavinaye dhamme desiyamāne sussūsati sotaṃ odahati aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapeti.
segments.en: Yet when a Realized One is teaching the Dhamma of removing conceit, they want to listen, they lend an ear, and they apply their minds to understand it.

segments.pli: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā ayaṃ dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo pātubhavati.
segments.en: This is the second incredible and amazing thing that appears with the appearance of a Realized One.
People like excitement, they love it and enjoy it.

segments.pli: Sā tathāgatena opasamike dhamme desiyamāne sussūsati sotaṃ odahati aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapeti.
segments.en: Yet when a Realized One is teaching the Dhamma of peace, they want to listen, they lend an ear, and they apply their minds to understand it.

segments.pli: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā ayaṃ tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo pātubhavati.
segments.en: This is the third incredible and amazing thing that appears with the appearance of a Realized One.
This population is lost in ignorance, trapped in their shells.

segments.pli: Sā tathāgatena avijjāvinaye dhamme desiyamāne sussūsati sotaṃ odahati aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapeti.
segments.en: Yet when a Realized One is teaching the Dhamma of removing ignorance, they want to listen, they lend an ear, and they apply their minds to understand it.

segments.pli: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā ayaṃ catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo pātubhavati.
segments.en: This is the fourth incredible and amazing thing that appears with the appearance of a Realized One.

segments.pli: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā ime cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā pātubhavantī”ti.
segments.en: With the appearance of a Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha, four incredible and amazing things appear.”
